titleStmt.title: The first booke of songes & ayres of foure parts with tableture for the lute So made that all the parts together, or either of them severally may be song to the lute, orpherian or viol de gambo. Composed by Robert Iones.
titleStmt.author: Jones, Robert, fl. 1597-1615.

titleStmt.title: The first booke of songes & ayres of foure parts with tableture for the lute So made that all the parts together, or either of them severally may be song to the lute, orpherian or viol de gambo. Composed by Robert Iones.
titleStmt.author: Jones, Robert, fl. 1597-1615.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Peter Short with the assent of Thomas Morley, and are to be sold at the signe of the Starre on Bredstreet hill,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; lacks leaves A1,2 - supplied in manuscript. Title page border taken from title page of the Second booke.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
